snippet: The bill would prevent cities and counties from regulating the “sale, use or disposition of auxiliary containers,” which include single-use disposable bags, boxes, cans and bottles.
abstract: Arizona State Legislature passes bill to prevent state's cities and counties from regulating the use of plastic bags and other containers; law is polar opposite of measures in other states that have banned plastic bags for environmental reasons.
lead_paragraph: The bill would prevent cities and counties from regulating the “sale, use or disposition of auxiliary containers,” which include single-use disposable bags, boxes, cans and bottles.

headline.main: Arizona Bill Would Ban Local Limits on Plastic Bags
headline.print_headline: Arizona Bill Would Ban Local Limits on Plastic Bags
